channel.title: Comments on: Thinking Caps – Get free N3,000 Airtime for Answering Quiz

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/thinking-caps/#comment-2272">Ibrahim Shehu kasim</a>.
They are no more paying.

In reply to Ibrahim Shehu kasim.

They are no more paying.

item.title: By: Ibrahim Shehu kasim
item.dc:creator: Ibrahim Shehu kasim
item.description: Am still awaiting for my recharge card seriously I take my time to do this quiz please come to my aid please thinking caps
